name: Badgis & The Supercilious Maze of Malcontents
name_original: Badgis & The Supercilious Maze of Malcontents
description:
The Back Story

I was challenged by my friend Ollie, from Mashup Games, to create a game using his art assets in 24 hours.

Navigate your way through a labyrinth full of interesting characters.  Can you unlock the secret of the maze, or will you get lost trying?

Features
  • 8 Hidden Characters
  • Deep Underlying Story
  • Original Music
  • Incredibly a"Mazing"
Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Talk/Chat - Left Click
  • Jump- Space Bar
Other

For those who are curious on how I made the game, watch my Dev Log here!

Disclaimer

Goodgis has no control over Badgis and his, for lack of a better word, bad behavior. In no way do the characters in this game reflect real personalities or people. Well, I guess technically they could but that's besides the point. This "amazing" experience is tongue and cheek game, so please don't talk any of this to heart.
